property.description: Transform the LiveTable filter input into suggest inorder to filter by the key ( for eg : XWiki.User1 ), we can use this macros on a dbList field property. This macro should be called before the livetable macro

The url of the suggest service. (eg: xwiki/bin/view/Space/name?xpage=suggest&classname=class&fieldname=fieldname ) the content of this service should be an xml like : <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <results type="5"><rs id="" info="$key">$value</rs> ....</results>
The input filed that will be used as suggest
